wikipedia_page.main: Vincent Anthony Stuart (28 December 1907 – 1974) was an English boxer who competed for Great Britain in the 1936 Summer Olympics.

response: *Quarter-final: Anthony Stuart (Great Britain), won on points
In 1936 he was eliminated in the first round of the heavyweight class after losing his fight to Anthony Stuart.
In 1936 he was eliminated in the second round of the heavyweight class after losing his fight to Anthony Stuart.
